com.travelbank.knit.components

Class ComponentTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.travelbank.knit.components.ComponentTag

  • public final class ComponentTag
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a unique MemoryEntity inside UsageGraph At it's core, it holds a Short value to differentiate entities. Each entity created will be assigned a different ComponentTag with a unique Short . These get created incrementally.
